channel.title: How to make a level 99 when you log in
channel.description: When you log in how do you make everyone get 99 slayer so lets say i log in, i want to have 99 slayer when i log in. What do i edit and such?

item.title: How to make a level 99 when you log in
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I’ve seen lots of sources without this command.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a level 99 when you log in
item.dc:creator: @pking_nubs3 pking nubs3
item.description:
@pking_nubs3 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:3, topic:261682”][quote author=pking nubs3 link=topic=345589.msg2663942#msg2663942 date=1234404572]
Get on change rights to 3 … And…

::master

[/quote]

What makes you think he automatically has a command called “master”?[/quote]Maybe because all servers sources have that command?
That applys for him not the other people that play.

item.title: How to make a level 99 when you log in
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

playerLevel[18] = 99;

That is really all you need, the rest is common sense.
